name: Space Delurium
description:
A little weekend project for testing making games with p5js.

It's a flappy bird meets basic shump gameplay. Using your microphone as the input, louder sounds give higher vertical speed to the starship. Shoot with the spacebar.

 

Open Source Assets:

Custom made Sprites & Sprites from : https://opengameart.org/

Custom made Sounds with BFXR https://www.bfxr.net/ with & Sounds from : https://freesound.org/
